clinical_study.brief_title: Internet-delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy for Older Adults With Anxiety
clinical_study.official_title: Individually-tailored Internet-delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy Treatment for Older Adults With Anxiety and Depression: a Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated cognitive behaviour therapy (ICBT) is a feasible approach in the treatment of anxiety symptoms and comorbid depressive symptoms in older adults.
